1.text: The first day also of the seventh month shall be venerable and holy unto you; you shall do no servile work therein, because it is the day of the sounding and of trumpets.

2.text: And you shall offer a holocaust for a most sweet odour to the Lord, one calf of the herd, one ram and seven lambs of a year old, without blemish.

3.text: And for their sacrifices, three tenths of flour tempered with oil to every calf, two tenths to a ram,

4.text: One tenth to a lamb, which in all are seven lambs:

5.text: And a buck goat for sin, which is offered for the expiation of the people,

6.text: Besides the holocaust of the first day of the month with the sacrifices thereof, and the perpetual holocaust with the accustomed libations. With the same ceremonies you shall offer a burnt sacrifice for a most sweet odour to the Lord.

7.text: The tenth day also of this seventh month shall be holy and venerable unto you, and you shall afflict your souls: you shall do no servile work therein.

8.text: And you shall offer a holocaust to the Lord for a most sweet odour, one calf of the herd, one ram, and seven lambs of a year old, without blemish:

9.text: And for their sacrifices, three tenths of flour tempered with oil to every calf, two tenths to a ram,

10.text: The tenth of a tenth to every lamb, which are in all seven lambs:

11.text: And a buck goat for sin, besides the things that are wont to be offered for sin, for expiation, and for the perpetual holocaust with their sacrifice and libations.

12.text: And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month, which shall be unto you holy and venerable, you shall do no servile work, but shall celebrate a solemnity to the Lord seven days.

13.text: And you shall offer a holocaust for a most sweet odour to the Lord, thirteen calves of the herd, two rams, and fourteen lambs of a year old, without blemish:

14.text: And for their libations three tenths of flour tempered with oil to every calf, being in all thirteen calves: and two tenths to each ram, being two rams,

15.text: And the tenth of a tenth to every lamb, being in all fourteen lambs:

16.text: And a buck goat for sin, besides the perpetual holocaust, and the sacrifice and the libation thereof.

17.text: On the second day you shall offer twelve calves of the herd, two rams and fourteen lambs of a year old, without blemish :

18.text: And the sacrifices and the libations for every one, for the calves and for the rams and for the lambs you shall duly celebrate:

19.text: And a buck goat for a sin offering besides the perpetual holocaust, and the sacrifice and the libation thereof.

20.text: The third day you shall offer eleven calves, two rams, and fourteen lambs of a year old, without blemish:

21.text: And the sacrifices and the libations of every one for the calves and for the rams and for the lambs you shall offer according to the rite:

22.text: And a buck goat for sin, besides the perpetual holocaust, and the sacrifice, and the libation thereof.

23.text: The fourth day you shall offer tell calves, two rams, and fourteen lambs of a year old, without blemish:

24.text: And the sacrifices and the libations of every one for the calves and for the rams and for the lambs you shall celebrate in right manner:

25.text: And a buck goat for sin, besides the perpetual holocaust, and the sacrifice and the libation thereof.

26.text: The fifth day you shall offer nine calves, two rams, and fourteen lambs of a year old, without blemish:

27.text: And the sacrifices and the libations of every one for the calves and for the rams and for the lambs you shall celebrate according to the rite:

28.text: And a buck goat for sin, besides the perpetual holocaust, and the sacrifice and the libation thereof.

29.text: The sixth day you shall offer eight calves, two rams, and fourteen lambs of a year old, without blemish:

30.text: And the sacrifices and the libations of every one for the calves and for the rams and for the lambs you shall celebrate according to the rite:

31.text: And a buck goat for sin, besides the perpetual holocaust, and the sacrifice and the libation thereof.

32.text: The seventh day you shall offer seven calves and two rams, and fourteen lambs of a year old, without blemish:

33.text: And the sacrifices and the libations of every one for the calves and for the rams and for the lambs you shall celebrate according to the rite:

34.text: And a buck goat for sin, besides the perpetual holocaust, and the sacrifice and the libation thereof.

35.text: On the eighth day, which is most solemn, you shall do no servile work:

36.text: But you shall offer a holocaust for a most sweet odour to the Lord, one calf, one ram, and seven lambs of a year old, without blemish:

37.text: And the sacrifices and the libations of every one for the calves and for the rams and for the lambs you shall celebrate according to the rite:

38.text: And a buck goat for sin, besides the perpetual holocaust, and the sacrifice and the libation thereof.

39.text: These things shall you offer to the Lord in your solemnities: besides your vows and voluntary oblations for holocaust, for sacrifice, for libation, and for victims of peace offerings.

40.text: And Moses told the children of Israel all that the Lord had commanded him :
